snippet: Now that voters have lived with the budget cuts, Republican candidates are dividing themselves into different camps — conservative, moderate, conciliator, fighter — to win the coming election.
lead_paragraph: Now that voters have lived with the budget cuts, Republican candidates are dividing themselves into different camps — conservative, moderate, conciliator, fighter — to win the coming election.

headline.seo: Republicans With a New Message for Texas: It’s Not Just About Cuts
headline.main: Message of a New Crop of Republican Candidates: It’s Not Just About Cuts
headline.print_headline: Message of a New Crop of Republican Candidates: It’s Not Just About Cuts
